ALREADY REGISTERED? CLICK HERE TO LOGIN

Introducing our Android application "Pocket Guard" that provides safety in emergency situations. Our app is designed to give you peace of mind in times of crisis by allowing you to quickly and easily call for help with just the touch of a button. 

With features such as location sharing, emergency contacts, and an SOS alarm, our app ensures that you are never alone in a dangerous situation. 

Whether you are walking home alone at night or need assistance in a medical emergency, our app has got you covered.Our top priority is your safety, and we strive to make our app accessible and user-friendly for everyone.

561, Sunrise Hills,
 Easter Point Road,

 India

Installation of Hidden Cameras at various public places used by woman has been one of the greatest havoc problems of women's self respect and dignity. So, this feature of Pocket Guard helps women to detect hidden cameras anywhere.

Types of Hidden cameras :-

1. Hidden cameras which emit IR rays :-

Your phone's camera with night vision can detect the blinking of these rays same as we test the remote control of TV.

2. Advanced Electronic Hidden cameras :-

These cameras do not emit IR rays but as these are electronic cameras so they radiate Electromagnetic radiations.

And we have developed a simulation by the help of the magnetometer sensor of your phone which helps you detect any electronic device.
But as the hidden cameras are installed mostly at those places where use of electronic devices is not needed. So, detecting any electronic device at those places ensures the chances of spy camera installation. You have to just move and scan all the suspected places by your phone and if there is any hidden camera then Pocket Guard will start beeping. Make sure that the phone is very much close to the suspected area.

Pocket Guard respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number for account creation and device information to improve user experience. We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except when required by law. We use reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access and allow you to access, correct, and delete your information. By using Pocket Guard, you consent to this policy and any updates.
